attributes.review:
I was at the doctors office to get my lice check when I decided to download this app. First when I went on the app a load of naked children came up, I was honestly terrified while thinking of how pretty and handsome they all were. But I guess one of the doctors had noticed what had happened and though I was watching child p0rn. She called the cops and they arrested me. I am now in my cell. I am bunk mates with a cereal killer! A CEREAL KILLER! I was given 69 years. Trump 2020 

six feet under ground
attributes.title: Cheeto puff ruined my day

attributes.review: So I am a proud mother and my daughter downloaded the app to see what it was about. When she did she came to me and she was possessed chanting rituals. I screamed and called for help but when she looked and her phone she saw a Cheeto and she died. I then checked her phone to see why she died and I saw the Cheeto giving a speech and I almost died. I am currently in the hospital because after I passed out my house caught on fire and my whole city burnt down because my daughter was an idiot. Don’t download.
attributes.title: Crazy man

attributes.review: When I opened the app all I saw was a Cheeto puff I was so confused then I kept getting annoyed with notifications. I went on with my day but then I started feeling like someone was watching me I went outside not only to see a army of Cheeto puffs outside my house they started viciously attacking me. I ended up in the ER because of them. Dang Cheeto puffs stalked me through this app until they had a chance to attack me. that’s why you should delete it and the person who made it.
attributes.title: Racist Cheeto head
attributes.userName: now iknow whats real or fake

attributes.review: I’m leaving this review because Trump is attempting to violate my first amendment right of freedom of speech. It’s not my fault that the little organize Cheeto puff can’t handle being one upped by gen z. He really should have just stayed in that bunker if he’s so scared. Anyways, I truly hope Trump loses the next election and is finally held accountable for his actions. I’m tired of having a president with dozens of sexual assault allegations against him. If trump doesn’t respect women then I don’t respect him. All presidents matter☺️✨🧚‍♂️except you😋🌸💫
attributes.title: No❤️

attributes.review: 🤮🤮I got the app to see when the next rally was going to be... so I could avoid it, but then the app suddenly crashed! At first I was like, I’m sure it’s just lagging because of the high amount of creeps on the app, so I reloaded it. I opened the app to find a giant orange stain on my phone!!! I was so scared at this point, like did it give my phone a virus!!? But I looked a little closer and realized it was simply Ronald dumb on my screen. Anyways, overall, not a great experience, wouldn’t recommend 👎🏼

i opened the app to see a giant ugly cheeto and  threw up all over my house. This cheeto is a disgusting racist pedo🤮. It was very disturbing😔. The app BUST in my house and DROP KICKED my little sister👁👄👁.It also caused a giraffe to break my window and yell at me to warn me about what a horrible app it was. i should’ve listened😭. i am permanently traumatized because of this app🤕. Do not download!!!! i was looking through the app and see a naked cheeto getting a spray tan😣. it was very offensive and should be removed from the app store immediately😡!!
attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP🤬🧚‍♀️

attributes.review: right when i got this app my house became infested with rats. they tried to eat me and my family so i had to fight back. not only that, once i started to fight them, a huge projection came out of no where of Donald Trump. they began staring at this photo of trump naked getting a spray tan, the image was horrifying. then, when i finally made my escape, the rats started chasing me and they had trumps face!!! i’ve moved to a different country now and i don’t plan on coming back to America
attributes.title: worst experience

attributes.review: I am so disgusted by this app. Right when I open it, I see a cheeto?! I thought this was supposed to be our president not a food company app? I was very confused and then I showed my mother and she passed out because the cheeto was so DISFIGURED. So we went to the hospital and they told me she had three days to live and they also told me she went blind!! Not only are the things on this app confusing but they are LETHAL. 🔪 So I don’t recommend this app, only for your safety and your humanity. Have a great day 🥴
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD ‼️🙄👿🤢

attributes.review: first of all, i downloaded it to boost the campaign but when i opened the app it opened up to a woman willingly eating bugs and standing on burning rocks saying “IT BURNS!!! TRUMP 2020!!!” i didn’t even know what to say. after that she opened her mouth and let the bugs crawl out and kept asking to be fed more 🤮. then she started to crush them up one by one and smear them all over her body 🤢🤢🤢. this app showed me that whole video just to get me to vote for trump but just traumatized me 🤢🤢🤢.
attributes.title: STAY AWAY FROM THIS APP

attributes.review: As soon as i opened it it called me a blue haired little liberal b*tch:(. it then proceeded to steal all my information and sell it on the black market. my identity has been stolen idk who i am anymore. after that it hacked all the apps and pics on my phone so that when i open anything then it shows an edit of trump in lingerie. i thought this was just a weird marketing technique.. until it got really personal. i got a facetime call from donald trump himself, and he told me i was an ugly n***er b*tch.
attributes.title: Awful app!
